function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of application of biophilic design principles","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for biophilic design in built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate covid-19 prevention measures in apartment units","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider the impact of spatial configuration on disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for virus or bacteria to be brought into housing from external sources","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate room quality in an apartment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of connection to nature, daylight, and fresh air in housing and residential areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for virus spread in apartment sharing systems such as ducting, shafts, or corridors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to adjust apartment design to increase resilience towards covid-19 and improve resident comfort","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate utilization of technology for mitigating the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cybersecurity risk due to accelerated digital transformation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective management and governance in dealing with contagious diseases","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accelerated innovations in technologies may lead to security vulnerabilities in online platforms and digital systems, increasing the risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telehealth technologies and platforms may lead to accessibility issues for individuals with limited digital literacy or technological resources.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of robust testing for innovative technologies and solutions may lead to deployment of unproven or flawed systems, increasing the risk of technological failures and negative impact on public health and safety.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper communication leading to risk perception among the public and affecting societal response to the pandemic.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of surveillance technologies leading to unmonitored spread of the infection.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient use of supply chain technologies leading to shortages of essential healthcare products.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapidly modified healthcare facilities may lead to increased risk of cross-contamination and spread of diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased power consumption after lockdown may lead to higher pollution levels and environmental health risks.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness and education about preventive measures and accurate information","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to follow established protocols and safety procedures by healthcare workers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent consumption of alcohol could potentially increase the health problems.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thermal scanners are not an effective method for diagnosis of covid-19, as it can only detect fever and infected individuals may not have fever yet.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased usage of mobile applications may lead to prolonged screen time, contributing to sedentary behaviors and potential health issues.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poorly designed or maintained mobile health m-health applications may lead to inaccurate health information, misdiagnosis, and ineffective treatment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data privacy and security measures in mobile applications may result in unauthorized access to personal health information and potential data breaches.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on robots in healthcare may lead to reduced human interaction and personalized care, impacting patient well-being.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper data security and privacy measures in robotics and communication systems poses a risk of sensitive healthcare information exposure.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of samples during drone transportation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate public engagement for supply requirements","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of surveillance drones leading to privacy concerns","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transportation of biological samples by drones","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delivery of medical supplies to austere territories using drones","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of infection through patient bookings and virtual doctor interactions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on iot for healthcare operations and drug delivery during epidemics.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drone technology for the delivery of medical supplies and goods during epidemics.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to implement ai in the surgical field for treating covid-19 infected patients may hinder the use of ai for patient treatment and ventilator parameter adjustments.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited utilization of ai technology in clinical trials and medicine development may slow down the process of achieving precise results and accelerating medicine and vaccine development.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited implementation of ai and machine learning in healthcare","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks in iot and drone technology","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance may infringe on privacy rights of individuals.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance technology may be used for purposes other than controlling the pandemic.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on surveillance technology may create a false sense of security.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Online education platforms may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly managed","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Live-streamed online sessions may pose a risk of disease transmission if participants are not following hygiene guidelines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 spreads easily and infected individuals may not show symptoms for 1-14 days.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robots assisting healthcare workers may fail to prevent the spread of contagious diseases if not properly sanitized or maintained.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Technological strategies for work from home, distance learning, and surveillance may lead to increased reliance on technology and potential privacy and security risks.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exponential increase in the use of telemedicine technology and chatbots","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
